title: Scope LLM document analysis for intake uploads (existing AI pipeline)
scope: Define document analysis flow using the existing ai_processor pipeline
Extract text/metadata from uploaded intake documents and create evidence map entries
Queue background processing after uploads to generate notebook updates
Persist case notebook and analysis outputs to the intake GCS bucket under the case folder
acceptance_criteria: Uploaded intake documents are processed via the existing ai_processor pipeline
Case notebook updates include evidence map entries and analysis results
Notebook and analysis artifacts are stored in the intake GCS bucket under the case folder
Processing failures return structured errors without breaking uploads
risk_notes: Document extraction may fail for certain formats and require fallback handling
Queued analysis could introduce delays and partial notebook state
Large uploads may exceed worker memory if streamed improperly
rollback_plan: Disable or bypass the document analysis queue and revert notebook updates
